name: Establishing Connection
description:
In establishing connection you control a ribbon cable and have to connect the two peripheral devices together. But its not that simple there is a variety of different computer parts and storage mediums that stand in your way. There is 5 different worlds each with six levels. Each world has a greater difficulty and size. Its a game that is easy to play but hard to master. Do you accept the challenge?

Controls:

Arrow keys

WSAD

Music:

Music volume can be changed in the option menu.
